job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s or higher degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering or related field

jd: From: Nitin Raj, Veridian Tech Solutions nitin@veridiants.com Reply to: nitin@veridiants.com Hi,Greetings from Veridian Tech Solutions, Inc!!! This is Nitin from Veridian Tech Solutions, Inc. Veridian Tech Solutions, Inc is providing enhanced IT consulting to top Notch IT Clients. I would appreciate it if you could render the requirement details below and if interested, kindly share a copy of your resume, else please take a moment to forward these Job details to someone you think might be interested and good fit for the job. Find the JD for your reference.Position: Python Developer with BigdataLocation: Phoenix, AZ (Onsite)Duration: ContractSkills requiredBachelor’s or higher degree in Data Science Computer Science Information Systems Engineering or related fieldStrong programming skills in Python and Java with ability to build apps and services quickly and efficientlyAbility to build and maintain application pipelines (batch and Realtime) that support the execution of AI/ML models and consumption of the model outputExperience on writing complex SQL (Hive/PySpark data frames) and NoSQL queries and optimizing data pipelinesExperience in Big Data ecosystem including Map-Reduce Hive Spark (core SQL and pyspark) and UNIX shell scriptingExperience in building applications and services in Cloud platforms Linkedin - https://www.linkedin.com/in/nitin-raj-83169b15a/Nitin RajTechnical Recruiter Veridian Tech Solutions, IncCertified by WOSB, WBENC, HUB nitin@veridiants.comwww.veridiants.com11931 Wick Chester Lane Suite 150 Houston, TX, 77043“Verdian is an Equal Opportunity Employer and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any kind.
